## ComposeTypeGuards type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ComposeTypeGuards<T extends Guards> = {
    [P in keyof T]: T[P];
} & {
    not: NegateTypeGuards<T>;
};
```
**References:** [Guards](./type-guard.guards.md)<!-- -->, [NegateTypeGuards](./type-guard.negatetypeguards.md)
